solid soap bars.title: Dove bar soap Pampering Beauty Cream, for all skin types, Shea Butter & Vanilla with ¼ moisturizing cream 90G
aboutThisItem: LOCK IN MOISTURE with this pampering beauty cream soap bar, with shea butter, vanilla, 1/4 moisturising cream and gentle cleansers for soft, smooth skin.
#1 SOAP BRAND DERMATOLOGISTS USE AT HOME. Gently cleans away dirt and germs. Dove Beauty Cream Bar replenishes your skin's nutrients and retain its natural moisture, rather than stripping it away.
Dove's Ph-balanced cleansing beauty soap bar is recommended by dermatologists for daily skin care.
ZERO SULFATES. Dove Beauty Bar is made with naturally gentle cleansers so you can use it every day on both your body and your face.
SOFTER, SMOOTHER SKIN. ¼ Moisturizing cream helps skin to maintain its natural moisture, so it feels softer and smoother before you’ve even stepped out of the shower.

LUX Flaw-less Skin Bar Soap brightens, nourishes, and hydrates your skin to reveal a Flaw-less skin
New LUX Bar Soap is your first step to a Flaw-less, visibly softer, and smoother skin
Indulge in LUX nourishing soap, rich creamy lather, and the delicate fragrance blend of lilies as you shower
Experience the transformation to Flaw-less skin in just a few weeks after using this soap bar

SKIN-FRIENDLY: Dermatologically tested for safe daily use.
